title: Creamy tuna and mushroom pasta bake
ingredients: ['350g egg pasta', '1/2 onion, chopped', '240g grated Cheddar cheese', '150g frozen garden peas', '2 (160g) tins tuna, drained', '2 (295g) tins condensed cream of mushroom soup', '1/2 (300g) tin chopped mushrooms', '125g crushed potato crisps']
